page.guaranteeBody: No matter what service you choose, Elsevier Author services are always guaranteed. If your manuscript is rejected due to an English proofreading issue, we will re-edit your paper for free or give you a full refund.
page.usp2Intro: We accept a wide range of documents and formats, such as journal articles, research papers, PhD theses, reports, books, grant applications, LaTeX format, and PowerPoint presentations.
page.whyTitle: 为何选择 Elsevier 语言校对服务？
page.whyBody: 科学研究的发表量一直在不断增加，这使得原稿越来越难被接受。语言质量在确保投稿成功之中起到特别重要的作用。借助 Elsevier 语言校对服务，您能获得博士级母语专家的支持，确保您的投稿中没有任何英语用语错误，从而提高您的成功机会。
